VerificationIPFlowParameters VerificationIPFlowParameters Class

In this Article

Edit

VerificationIPFlowParameters(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String)

Initializes a new instance of the VerificationIPFlowParameters class.

Properties summary

Direction
Direction

Gets or sets the direction of the packet represented as a 5-tuple. Possible values include: 'Inbound', 'Outbound'
LocalIPAddress
LocalIPAddress

Gets or sets the local IP address. Acceptable values are valid IPv4 addresses.
LocalPort
LocalPort

Gets or sets the local port. Acceptable values are a single integer in the range (0-65535). Support for * for the source port, which depends on the direction.
Protocol
Protocol

Gets or sets protocol to be verified on. Possible values include: 'TCP', 'UDP'
RemoteIPAddress
RemoteIPAddress

Gets or sets the remote IP address. Acceptable values are valid IPv4 addresses.
RemotePort
RemotePort

Gets or sets the remote port. Acceptable values are a single integer in the range (0-65535). Support for * for the source port, which depends on the direction.
TargetNicResourceId
TargetNicResourceId

Gets or sets the NIC ID. (If VM has multiple NICs and IP forwarding is enabled on any of them, then this parameter must be specified. Otherwise optional).
TargetResourceId
TargetResourceId

Gets or sets the ID of the target resource to perform next-hop on.

    Parameters

    • targetResourceId
      String
      String

      The ID of the target resource to perform next-hop on.

    • direction
      String
      String

      The direction of the packet represented as a 5-tuple. Possible values include: 'Inbound', 'Outbound'

    • protocol
      String
      String

      Protocol to be verified on. Possible values include: 'TCP', 'UDP'

    • localPort
      String
      String

      The local port. Acceptable values are a single integer in the range (0-65535). Support for * for the source port, which depends on the direction.

    • remotePort

      String

      The remote port. Acceptable values are a single integer in the range (0-65535). Support for * for the source port, which depends on the direction.

    • localIPAddress

      The local IP address. Acceptable values are valid IPv4 addresses.

    • remoteIPAddress
      String
      String

      The remote IP address. Acceptable values are valid IPv4 addresses.

    • targetNicResourceId
      String
      String

      The NIC ID. (If VM has multiple NICs and IP forwarding is enabled on any of them, then this parameter must be specified. Otherwise optional).
